author: Nick Mordowanec
title: Under Russian Assault, Kharkiv Kids, Pets Huddle on Subway Station Floor
description: Valentyna Dylova is hiding underground with hundreds of other Ukrainians, hoping for the best in a country being torn apart by Russian aggression.
content:
Valentyna Dylova feels both terrified and strong as she hears random bursts of artillery on the ground above her.
The 29-year-old Ukrainian citizen communicated with Newsweek via WhatsApp from Kharkâ€¦ [+4133 chars]
